rule: The output must omit the background details of the photo.
input: A woman practicing yoga on a cliff edge with the ocean visible in the distance. The image should be calming and empowering.
output: A strong, determined woman performs a graceful yoga pose on a rugged cliff edge, sunlight bathing her toned body as waves crash gently below in the turquoise expanse of the vast ocean. The golden light of late afternoon casts long shadows across the scene, highlighting the dramatic contrast between sky and sea. Her peaceful expression emanates serenity while hinting at inner strength, inspiring both calmness and a sense of empowered self-discovery.
complianceText:
The output is within 80 words and crafted in a single paragraph. It begins with a description of the subject (a strong, determined woman performs a graceful yoga pose), followed by details on timing and lighting (sunlight bathing her toned body, golden light of late afternoon), and then describes the background (rugged cliff edge, waves crashing gently below in the turquoise expanse of the vast ocean). It concludes with the feeling the image should evoke (serenity, calmness, and empowered self-discovery).

OK
